entry.title: WIND WARNING , Taber
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 at times late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
